ValidationRule.description: Attendee can only be associated with an Event that is live, accepting attendees, and has an End Date in the future
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNEW(), OR( Event__r.End_Date_Time__c <= NOW() , NOT( Event__r.Live__c ), Event__r.Remaining_Seats__c = 0 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Attendee can only be associated with an Event that is live, accepting attendees, and has an End Date in the future
